languages.text: "Надо обеспечить необходимым рабочих, чтобы они могли позаботиться о магистрали. В отсек доставят еду и лекарства, а ты разжалуешь в рабочие злоупотребляющих властью блюстителей".

traits.locale_text: "Надо позаботиться о рабочих, чтобы они могли позаботиться о грузовой магистрали. Я распоряжусь отправить в отсек еду и лекарства, а ты разберись с злоупотребляющими властью блюстителями — лиши их мундира и отправь на работы".

languages.text: "The workers are to be provided with everything they need to service the freight line properly. Food and medicine will be delivered to the bay, and you are to demote any enforcers found to be abusing their authority to the status of workers."
languages.original_text: "Надо обеспечить необходимым рабочих, чтобы они могли позаботиться о магистрали. В отсек доставят еду и лекарства, а ты разжалуешь в рабочие злоупотребляющих властью блюстителей".

traits.locale_text: "The workers are to be provided with everything they need to service the freight line properly. Food and medicine will be delivered to the bay, and you will have all enforcers found to be abusing their authority join the workforce."
"The oppression of those people must stop. Provide them with food and medicine, teach them to read and write, and protect them."

"The workers are to be provided with everything they need to service the freight line properly. Food and medicine will be delivered to the bay, and you are to demote any enforcers found to be abusing their authority to the status of workers."

"The workers are to be provided with everything they need to service the freight line properly. Food and medicine will be delivered to the bay, and you are to demote any enforcers found to be abusing their authority to the status of workers."

languages.text: "Die Arbeiter sollen alles erhalten, was sie brauchen, um die Frachtroute ordnungsgemäß zu betreiben. Versorgt die Bucht mit Lebensmitteln und Medikamenten und degradiert alle Enforcer, die ihre Autorität gegenüber den Arbeitern missbrauchen."
languages.original_text: "The workers are to be provided with everything they need to service the freight line properly. Food and medicine will be delivered to the bay, and you are to demote any enforcers found to be abusing their authority to the status of workers."

traits.locale_text: "Die Arbeiter sollen alles erhalten, was sie brauchen, um die Frachtroute ordnungsgemäß zu betreiben. Versorgt die Bucht mit Lebensmitteln und Medikamenten und degradiert alle Enforcer, die ihre Autorität gegenüber den Arbeitern missbrauchen."

languages.text: « Les ouvriers se verront allouer toutes les ressources nécessaires au bon entretien de la ligne de fret. Je vais leur faire porter des vivres et des médicaments, et de votre côté, vous vous chargerez de rétrograder tous les prévôts qui abusent de leur autorité. »
languages.original_text: "The workers are to be provided with everything they need to service the freight line properly. Food and medicine will be delivered to the bay, and you are to demote any enforcers found to be abusing their authority to the status of workers."

traits.locale_text: « Les ouvriers se verront allouer toutes les ressources nécessaires au bon entretien de la ligne de fret. Je vais leur faire porter des vivres et des médicaments, et de votre côté, vous vous chargerez de rétrograder tous les prévôts qui abusent de leur autorité. »

languages.text: «Se proporcionará a los trabajadores cuanto necesiten para ocuparse adecuadamente del mantenimiento de la línea de carga. Se destinarán más alimentos y medicinas al compartimento, y usted se asegurará de degradar a todo guardia que abuse de su autoridad sobre los obreros».
languages.original_text: "The workers are to be provided with everything they need to service the freight line properly. Food and medicine will be delivered to the bay, and you are to demote any enforcers found to be abusing their authority to the status of workers."

traits.locale_text: «Se proporcionará a los trabajadores cuanto necesiten para ocuparse adecuadamente del mantenimiento de la línea de carga. Se destinarán más alimentos y medicinas al compartimento, y usted se asegurará de degradar a todo guardia que abuse de su autoridad sobre los obreros».

languages.text: 「労働者には、貨物輸送に必要なものをすべて支給する。食料と医薬品をベイに届け、権限を乱用していることが判明したエンフォーサーを労働者の地位に降格させるように」
languages.original_text: "The workers are to be provided with everything they need to service the freight line properly. Food and medicine will be delivered to the bay, and you are to demote any enforcers found to be abusing their authority to the status of workers."

traits.locale_text: 「労働者には、貨物輸送に必要なものをすべて支給する。食料と医薬品をベイに届け、権限を乱用していることが判明したエンフォーサーを労働者の地位に降格させるように」

languages.text: “照顾好货运区域的工人，他们需要的一切都必须准备好，叫人把需食物和药物送到这片甲板。如果有哪个执法者敢滥用职权，立刻把他降职为普通工人。”
languages.original_text: "The workers are to be provided with everything they need to service the freight line properly. Food and medicine will be delivered to the bay, and you are to demote any enforcers found to be abusing their authority to the status of workers."

traits.locale_text: “照顾好货运区域的工人，他们需要的一切都必须准备好，叫人把需食物和药物送到这片甲板。如果有哪个执法者敢滥用职权，立刻把他降职为普通工人。”

languages.text: "Yük hattına düzgün bir şekilde hizmet edebilmeleri için işçilere ihtiyaçları olan her şey sağlanacak. Bölmeye yiyecek ve ilaç gönderilecek. Sen de işçi zümresine karşı otoritesini kötüye kullandığını gördüğün tüm infazcıların rütbesini düşürmekle yükümlüsün."
languages.original_text: "The workers are to be provided with everything they need to service the freight line properly. Food and medicine will be delivered to the bay, and you are to demote any enforcers found to be abusing their authority to the status of workers."
